querys.query: SELECT id, tags FROM manual WHERE company_id = :companyId and tags > ''

SELECT f.id AS favorite_id, m.* FROM manual m LEFT OUTER JOIN manual_favorite f ON m.id = f.manual_id AND f.member_id = :loginId WHERE m.company_id = :companyId AND ( CASE WHEN :checkFavorite = 1 THEN f.member_id = :loginId ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN IFNULL(:searchValue1, '') = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE ( m.title LIKE CONCAT( '%', IFNULL(:searchValue1, ''), '%' ) OR m.page_no = :searchValue1 ) END ) AND m.content LIKE CONCAT( '%', IFNULL(:searchValue2, ''), '%' ) AND m.tags LIKE CONCAT( '%', IFNULL(:tag, ''), '%' ) ORDER BY (m.page_no + 0) LIMIT :limit, :pageSize

SELECT COUNT(1) as total_count FROM manual m LEFT OUTER JOIN manual_favorite f ON m.id = f.manual_id AND f.member_id = :loginId WHERE m.company_id = :companyId AND ( CASE WHEN :checkFavorite = 1 THEN f.member_id = :loginId ELSE 1 = 1 END ) AND ( CASE WHEN IFNULL(:searchValue1, '') = '' THEN 1 = 1 ELSE ( m.title LIKE CONCAT( '%', IFNULL(:searchValue1, ''), '%' ) OR m.page_no = :searchValue1 ) END ) AND m.content LIKE CONCAT( '%', IFNULL(:searchValue2, ''), '%' ) AND m.tags LIKE CONCAT( '%', IFNULL(:tag, ''), '%' )
SELECT * FROM manual WHERE company_id = :companyId AND page_number > :pageNumber ORDER BY page_number, id LIMIT 1
INSERT INTO manual_favorite(company_id, manual_id, member_id) VALUES(:companyId, :manualId, :loginId)
DELETE FROM manual_favorite WHERE manual_id = :id AND member_id = :loginId

INSERT INTO manual(company_id, update_member_id, manual_index, page_number, page_no, page_code, title, tags, content, pdf_image_path) VALUES(:companyId, :loginId, :manualIndex, :pageNumber, :pageNo, :pageCode, :title, :tags, :content, :pdf_image_path)

UPDATE manual SET update_member_id = :loginId, page_number = :pageNumber, page_no = :pageNo, page_code = :pageCode, title = :title, tags = :tags, content = :content, pdf_image_path = :pdf_image_path WHERE id = :id
